title: PM hoists flag to mark 78th Independence Day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 14 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday hoisted the national flag in a National Flag Hoisting Ceremony held at the Pakistan Monument in connection with 78th Pakistan Independence Day celebrations.
The ceremony was also attended by national Olympic hero Arshad Nadeem and Chairman Senate Yusuf Raza Gilani.
The prime minister laid a floral wreath at the Pakistan Monument to pay tribute to the countryâ€™s founding fathers and national heroes.
